section.p: JavaBuilders requires just any decent Java IDE with a YAML editor. Remember to select fixed width font (e.g. Courier New, Monospaced ) for the editor, otherwise you will not be able to line up the spacing correctly in the file.

section.title: NetBeans
section.p: As of NetBeans 6.5 a YAML editor is included in the core distribution.

section.title: IntelliJ IDEA
section.p: A YAML editor is included in the core distribution.
